# Statistical Analysis Images

This folder contains all visualizations and statistical outputs generated from the analysis notebook.

## Generated Files

### Images (PNG, 300 DPI)
- `01_descriptive_statistics.png` - Distribution plots for repairs, turns, and words
- `02_initiation_resolution_patterns.png` - Repair pattern analysis (Initiation Ã— Resolution)
- `03_trigger_analysis.png` - Distribution of repair trigger categories
- `04_correlation_analysis.png` - Correlation scatter plots and heatmap

### Data Files (CSV)
- `descriptive_statistics.csv` - Summary descriptive statistics
- `weekly_statistics.csv` - Statistics broken down by week
- `student_statistics.csv` - Statistics broken down by student
- `contingency_table_initiation_resolution.csv` - Cross-tabulation table
- `correlation_matrix.csv` - Correlation coefficients matrix
- `trigger_categories.csv` - Counts of trigger categories

### Results (JSON/TXT)
- `chi2_results.json` - Chi-square test results
- `summary_report.txt` - Comprehensive text summary of all analyses

## Usage

All files are generated automatically when you run `notebooks/02_statistical_analysis.ipynb`.

Images are saved at 300 DPI for publication quality and can be directly imported into reports.
